login.welcome_message_2: Sign in and build come cool bots
login.forgotPWdNote: Don't worry. Resetting your password is easy, just tell us the email address you registered with WotNot.
login.twoFacAuthHeaderNote: Download a authenticator app on your mobile device, and scan this QR code to set up your account.
login.enter_2fa_code_note: Open the authenticator app on your mobile device and enter the 2FA code associated with your WotNot account.
login.recover_2fa_code_note: If you have lost your mobile device in which 2FA was enabled, just enter the recovery codes that were provided during setup to add a new device.
login.recover_code_note: Print or save these recovery codes in a safe place to be able to recover your account if you lose your mobile device.

chat.join_conversation_message: This conversation is not assigned to you. In order to write a message, click 'Join Conversation'

settings.active_status_message: Your status will determine whether the chats need to be assigned to you or not.

error.errPwd: Password must be greater than 5 characters
